subject: TestSuiteBuilder
msgSnippet: Ok...I posted my (ugly) implementation of a test suite builder.  It just runs through the classpath looking for classes that are derived from TestCase, and
messageBody:
Ok...I posted my (ugly) implementation of a test suite builder. It
just runs through the classpath looking for classes that are derived
from TestCase, and builds up a suite. If you have classes that
should be ignored, check out the excludedTests.properties file.

It is very rough because I haven't taken the time to go clean it up
yet. Feel free to do so. Maybe I'll throw it out on SourceForge if
anyone cares. Might work on it this weekend.

Or I'm sure that troublemaker Jason will rip it apart ;) hehehe....

Anyway...feel free to check it out. Just remember the code sucks (I
should know, since I wrote it), but it does have tests. Change the
tests, make the code better, make the world a more testable place :)

-Eric
